sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Update Cart line Visibility Status Value</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[fixCartLineVisibilityStatusValue();

function fixCartLineVisibilityStatusValue() {
    var CartLineGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_cart_line');
    CartLineGr.addEncodedQuery('visibility_status=supplier_blacklisted');
    CartLineGr.query();
    CartLineGr.setValue('visibility_status', 'supplier_excluded');
    CartLineGr.setWorkflow(false);
    CartLineGr.updateMultiple();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-12-08 22:18:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>dff2ad98b7852010ac81f1e4ae11a924</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Cart line Visibility Status Value</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_dff2ad98b7852010ac81f1e4ae11a924</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-12-08 23:29:36</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update Cart line Visibility Status Value
